title: Educated Guess
text: The null hypothesis is not about making a guess.

title: Soft Science
text: Statistics are not a soft science, so it does not affect the difference in hypothesis.

title: Purpose of the Null Hypothesis
text: The null hypothesis is the chance that the difference in the variables is only due to chance.

title: Certainty in Quantitative Research
text: Quantitative research involves probability, not certainty. Quantitative research often cannot prove certainty, because of the presence of statistical uncertainty.
